one_reviews_text:
2 stars for the quality of the game, very poor and fast boring.
5 stars for the idea: imagine that the castle is your house(s) and your money; now imagine that the lady sharks are your divorcing wife (ves). Great metaphor ;-)

Who knew bananas were so dangerous? I mean shooting the potassium out of them seems pretty crazy on it's own, but apparently sharks with legs want to get to me through magical barriers too. This is a wave shooter that has you defending a tower in a ridiculous way. It's funny and free, worth checking out if not just to ponder what Bent Light Industries is tripping on.

Took a minute to figure out the mechanics, but basically you are shooting these shark things on four sides while they are eating down your defenses.  You get a repair ducky which you can use to repair your entry ways as they come down, so it is a balancing act with 12 second intervals between waves.  I really like it a lot!
review_feedback: Thanks for the review! We are glad to hear you are enjoying our game! We plan on doing regular updates, so if you have a feature that you would like to see, visit our support page or shoot us an email at development@bentlightindustries.com

one_reviews_text:
I like the sharks with legs. And I like the banna gun. I like how the game looks. Its 
a awesome game.
This is definatly one of my favorite games on the Oculus store ever!!! I have had so much fun playing it!!!
review_feedback: That's awesome to hear! Thanks for taking the time to give us a review!
